comment: This test expects a simple PoK request test to fail, although it should succeed, so the test should fail; the purpose is to enable observing how the test framework reflects failures
provenance: DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY: this test was generated programatically; if you want to modify it, you can make a copy, and modify that.  For questions or suggestions about this test, file an issue at https://github.com/mark-moir/anoncreds-v2-rs -- and mention tag 2025-02-06
